Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the popularity of the Norwegian police uniforms among women.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the statement about the popularity of the uniforms.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph has been digitally altered to make the uniforms appear tighter.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the altered photograph may not accurately represent the actual uniforms worn by Norwegian police officers.
Falters at times: The claim falters in accurately representing the original photograph and its alteration.
